summary:
English: A complete new Hjerim awaits you! Its comfortable and adds a few extras ;)
I hope I fully translated it. If not, feel free to note me ^^

German: Ein komplett neues Hjerim erwartet euch! Gemuetlich und mit ein paar kleinen
Extras. ;)
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://orig01.deviantart.net/11bd/f/2015/117/0/6/curse_version_by_psycho_kuscheldecke-d8r9j0u.png[/img][/url][img]http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/262/e/f/logotoupload_by_psycho_kuscheldecke-d7zq4io.png[/img]

[size=6][color=blue] [font=Georgia]Please endorse if you like this Mod![/font][/color][/size][/center][center]

A complete new Hjerim awaits you! Its comfortable and adds a few extras .
[color=#ffff00]Though it's mainly designed for people, who don't like companions, spouses and children in their home ;P[/color][/center]



[list][*][size=3]You don't have to buy the house. Just activate the Mod and be happy  \o/[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=3]You should first complete the Quest [b]Blood on Ice[/b].[/size] Because with the mod it isn't possible anymore[/*]
[/list]
[list][*][size=3]There is a shrine in the Bedroom that needs SKSE. [/size]
[/*][*][size=3]If you [b]don't want[/b] to use[/size] [size=3]SKSE I have added an alternate version, which adds another shrine with other functionalities ;)[/size]
[/*][/list]
[list][*][size=3]I don't wanted to change Vanilla Scripts. So you can't use the house for your wife/husband. [/size][/*]
[/list](Also the house isn't designed for that.)
Though if you want, there are good mods outside I can recommend:

[list=1][*][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3]And for children: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23201/]Adopt a child[/url][/size][/*]
[/list]

[heading]Requirements[/heading]
Skyrim Patch 1.7.7.0.6 (or higher)
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE v. 1.5.11[/url] or higher (optional)

[heading]Known Bugs[/heading]
Sometimes the Mannequins could behave strange. If you have such problems
try out the Script Fix from SLuckyD
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url]


[center][heading]Credits[/heading]
Akira
-------
Scroll pile at the entrance
Thick book at the desk
Desk in the kitchen
Pictureframes
Distillery
mortar and pestle
Brass cup
Bottle for the "Potion of Explorer"
Contribution "Die vergessenen Verse" (only in the German version)
Betatesting

Master of Worlds
-----------------
Script that prevents a CTD when leaving the house
Betatesting

Dirtyolddunmer
----------------
Betatesting

Blary
-------
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14135]Booksets[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14133]FoodContainer[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134]OpenBooks[/url]

Bethesda
--------
For Skyrim

[heading]License/Legal[/heading]
You can translate this mod, but please add a link to the original in your description ;)
You are NOT allowed to upload this mod on the Steam Workshop!
You are not allowed to reupload a changed version of this mod as your own!
--------------------- Thank you ^^ ---------------------[/center]
author: VampyreFoxy
